amendment.description: An amendment numbered 93 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds from this Act to be used by the Department of Interior to change existing placer mining plans of operations in regard to re-vegetation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 93 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds from this Act to be used by the Department of Interior to change existing placer mining plans of operations in regard to re-vegetation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
